Thank you for all of the great postings. One the rarest recordings I've looking for from the 80's is Nuns - Rumania (PVC) 1986. It is a recording by the infamous S.F. Punk band from the late 70s. This recording sounds like a cross between Berlin & Blondie. If you come across it could you please post it. Thanks again.

just wanted to say thanks 80zforever, ive downloaded loads of your excellent 80s albums but never got round to thanking you but here is my belated appreciation for all of your fantastic work,it is very much appreciated
